Class Showtime

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.model.Showtime
@Entity public class Showtime extends Object
Represents a specific movie screening (showtime) in a cinema. Contains references to the movie, hall, and the start/end times of the screening.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Showtime()
    Default constructor for JPA.
    Showtime(Movie movie, Hall hall, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
    Constructs a new Showtime with the specified movie, hall, start time, and end time.

    • Showtime

      public Showtime(Movie movie, Hall hall, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Constructs a new Showtime with the specified movie, hall, start time, and end time.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie being shown.
      hall - The hall where the screening takes place.
      startTime - The start date and time of the screening.
      endTime - The end date and time of the screening.
